snippet: Women will be permitted to serve closer to the front lines, but still not in combat — angering some who say the rules do not go far enough.
abstract: Pentagon announces that women will be formally permitted in crucial and dangerous jobs closer to the front lines; but it stops short of officially allowing women to serve in combat; new rules keep in place a ban on women serving in the infantry, in combat tank units and in Special Operations commando units.
lead_paragraph: Women will be permitted to serve closer to the front lines, but still not in combat — angering some who say the rules do not go far enough.

headline.seo: Pentagon to Loosen Restrictions on Women in Combat
headline.main: Pentagon Allows Women Closer to Combat, but Not Close Enough for Some
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Allows Women Closer to Combat, but Not Close Enough for Some

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
